Function G2lib::collision¶

  • Defined in File G2lib_intersect.cc

Function Documentation¶

bool G2lib::collision(BaseCurve const &C1, BaseCurve const &C2)¶

Return true if the two curves intersect.

Parameters

  • C1 – [in] first curve

  • C2 – [in] second curve
